name: US Army War Survival Island
description:
Soldier!! Your army training is over and you are now going to be a part of US Army commando squad. Now this is real battle you are going to experience some real war. Get your guns out and ready to fight for your country. This game is story based in which a US Army cargo airplane is transporting some top secret military weapons and files. This plane crashed in the middle of pacific ocean. The plane exploded in the mid air no one survived except you. You trained as a black shadow elite commando and you are in the middle of ocean. Then you saw a raft and finally reached on a small island. The survival Adventure is not finished yet but it is the start of your journey.

Game Features:

- Action packed challenging missions with driving a Raft
- Realistic action packed battle field
- Escape Gun Shot & Dodge Enemy Air Strike
- Thrill of Playing the Role of a War Survivor
- Battle against world’s best military forces
